<div class="ps-relative overflow-hidden">
<p class="mb2"><strong>Teams</strong></p>
<p class="mb12 fs-caption fc-black-400">Q&amp;A for work</p>
<p class="mb12 fs-caption fc-medium">Connect and share knowledge within a single location that is structured and easy to search.</p>
<a class="js-gps-track s-btn s-btn__primary s-btn__xs" data-ga='["teams left navigation - anonymous","left nav cta","stackoverflow.com/teams",null,null]' data-gps-track="teams.create.left-sidenav.click({ Action: CtaClick })" href="https://stackoverflow.com/teams">

                </a>
</div>
<div class="ps-absolute t8 r8">
<svg aria-hidden="true" class="fc-orange-500 svg-spot spotPeople" height="48" viewbox="0 0 48 48" width="48"><path d="M13.5 28a4.5 4.5 0 100-9 4.5 4.5 0 000 9zM7 30a1 1 0 011-1h11a1 1 0 011 1v5h11v-5a1 1 0 011-1h12a1 1 0 011 1v10a2 2 0 01-2 2H33v5a1 1 0 01-1 1H20a1 1 0 01-1-1v-5H8a1 1 0 01-1-1V30zm25-6.5a4.5 4.5 0 109 0 4.5 4.5 0 00-9 0zM24.5 34a4.5 4.5 0 100-9 4.5 4.5 0 000 9z" opacity=".2"></path><path d="M16.4 26.08A6 6 0 107.53 26C5.64 26.06 4 27.52 4 29.45V40a1 1 0 001 1h9a1 1 0 100-2h-4v-7a1 1 0 10-2 0v7H6v-9.55c0-.73.67-1.45 1.64-1.45H16a1 1 0 00.4-1.92zM12 18a4 4 0 110 8 4 4 0 010-8zm16.47 14a6 6 0 10-8.94 0A3.6 3.6 0 0016 35.5V46a1 1 0 001 1h14a1 1 0 001-1V35.5c0-1.94-1.64-3.42-3.53-3.5zM20 28a4 4 0 118 0 4 4 0 01-8 0zm-.3 6h8.6c1 0 1.7.75 1.7 1.5V45h-2v-7a1 1 0 10-2 0v7h-4v-7a1 1 0 10-2 0v7h-2v-9.5c0-.75.7-1.5 1.7-1.5zM42 22c0 1.54-.58 2.94-1.53 4A3.5 3.5 0 0144 29.45V40a1 1 0 01-1 1h-9a1 1 0 110-2h4v-7a1 1 0 112 0v7h2v-9.55A1.5 1.5 0 0040.48 28H32a1 1 0 01-.4-1.92A6 6 0 1142 22zm-2 0a4 4 0 10-8 0 4 4 0 008 0z"></path><path d="M17 10a1 1 0 011-1h12a1 1 0 110 2H18a1 1 0 01-1-1zm1-5a1 1 0 100 2h12a1 1 0 100-2H18zm-4-4a1 1 0 00-1 1v12a1 1 0 001 1h5.09l4.2 4.2a1 1 0 001.46-.04l3.7-4.16H34a1 1 0 001-1V2a1 1 0 00-1-1H14zm1 12V3h18v10h-5a1 1 0 00-.75.34l-3.3 3.7-3.74-3.75a1 1 0 00-.71-.29H15z" opacity=".35"></path></svg>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<h1 class="fs-headline1 ow-break-word mb8 grid--cell fl1" itemprop="name"><a class="question-hyperlink" href="/questions/869809/combine-regexp">Combine Regexp?</a></h1>
<div class="ml12 aside-cta grid--cell print:d-none sm:ml0 sm:mb12 sm:order-first sm:as-end">
<a class="ws-nowrap s-btn s-btn__primary" href="/questions/ask">
        Ask Question
    </a>

<div class="grid fw-wrap pb8 mb16 bb bc-black-075">
<div class="grid--cell ws-nowrap mr16 mb8" title="2009-05-15 17:01:42Z">

<div class="js-zone-container zone-container-main">

<div class="post-layout">
<div class="votecell post-layout--left">
<div class="js-voting-container grid jc-center fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="869809">
<button aria-label="Up vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This question shows research effort; it is useful and clear"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowUpLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10 2 26z"></path></svg></button>
<div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" data-value="60" itemprop="upvoteCount">60</div>
<button aria-label="Down vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This question does not show any research effort; it is unclear or not useful"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowDownLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26 2 10z"></path></svg></button>
<button aria-label="Bookmark (39)" aria-pressed="false" class="js-bookmark-btn s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer py4 js-gps-track" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-gps-track="post.click({ item: 1, priv: 0, post_type: 1 })" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-yellow-600" title="Bookmark this question.">
<svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconBookmark" height="18" viewbox="0 0 18 18" width="18"><path d="M6 1a2 2 0 00-2 2v14l5-4 5 4V3a2 2 0 00-2-2H6zm3.9 3.83h2.9l-2.35 1.7.9 2.77L9 7.59l-2.35 1.7.9-2.76-2.35-1.7h2.9L9 2.06l.9 2.77z"></path></svg>
<div class="js-bookmark-count mt4" data-value="39">39</div>
</button>
<a aria-label="Timeline" class="js-post-issue grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer py6 mx-auto" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-shortcut="T" href="/posts/869809/timeline" title="Show activity on this post."><svg aria-hidden="true" class="mln2 mr0 svg-icon iconHistory" height="18" viewbox="0 0 19 18" width="19"><path d="M3 9a8 8 0 113.73 6.77L8.2 14.3A6 6 0 105 9l3.01-.01-4 4-4-4h3L3 9zm7-4h1.01L11 9.36l3.22 2.1-.6.93L10 10V5z"></path></svg></a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="postcell post-layout--right">
<div class="s-prose js-post-body" itemprop="text">
<p>After collecting user input for various conditions like</p>
<ol>
<li>Starts with : <code>/(^@)/</code></li>
<li>Ends with : <code>/(@$)/</code></li>
<li>Contains : <code>/@/</code></li>
<li>Doesn't contains</li>
</ol>
<p>To make single regex if user enter multiple conditions,
I combine them with <code>"|"</code> so if 1 and 2 given it become <code>/(^@)|(@$)/</code></p>
<p>This method works so far but,</p>
<p>I'm not able to determine correctly, What should be regex for 4 the condition? And combining regex this way work?</p>
<hr/>
<blockquote>
<p>Update: @(user input) won't be same
  for two conditions and not all four
  conditions always present but they can
  be and in future I might need more
  conditions like "is exactly" and "is
  exactly not" etc. so, I'm more curious
  to know this approach will scale ?</p>
<p>Also there may be issues of user input
  cleanup so regex escaped properly, but
  that is ignored right now.</p>
</blockquote>
</div>
<div class="mt24 mb12">

<a name="870506"></a>
<div class="answer accepted-answer" data-answerid="870506" id="answer-870506" itemprop="acceptedAnswer" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Answer">
<div class="post-layout">
<div class="votecell post-layout--left">
<div class="js-voting-container grid jc-center fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="870506">
<button aria-label="Up vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This answer is useful"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowUpLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10 2 26z"></path></svg></button>
<div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" data-value="104" itemprop="upvoteCount">104</div>
<button aria-label="Down vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This answer is not useful"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowDownLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26 2 10z"></path></svg></button>
<div aria-label="Accepted" class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--cell fc-green-500 py6 mtn8" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" role="note" tabindex="0" title="Loading when this answer was accepted…">
<div class="ta-center">
<svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8v-8z"></path></svg>
</div>
</div>
<a aria-label="Timeline" class="js-post-issue grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer py6 mx-auto" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-shortcut="T" href="/posts/870506/timeline" title="Show activity on this post."><svg aria-hidden="true" class="mln2 mr0 svg-icon iconHistory" height="18" viewbox="0 0 19 18" width="19"><path d="M3 9a8 8 0 113.73 6.77L8.2 14.3A6 6 0 105 9l3.01-.01-4 4-4-4h3L3 9zm7-4h1.01L11 9.36l3.22 2.1-.6.93L10 10V5z"></path></svg></a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
<div class="s-prose js-post-body" itemprop="text">
<p>Will the conditions be ORed or ANDed together?</p>
<pre>Starts with: abc
Ends with: xyz
Contains: 123
Doesn't contain: 456</pre>
<p>The OR version is fairly simple; as you said, it's mostly a matter of inserting pipes between individual conditions.  The regex simply stops looking for a match as soon as one of the alternatives matches.</p>
<pre><code>/^abc|xyz$|123|^(?:(?!456).)*$/
</code></pre>
<p>That fourth alternative may look bizarre, but that's how you express "doesn't contain" in a regex.  By the way, the order of the alternatives doesn't matter; this is effectively the same regex:</p>
<pre><code>/xyz$|^(?:(?!456).)*$|123|^abc/
</code></pre>
<p>The AND version is more complicated.  After each individual regex matches, the match position has to be reset to zero so the next regex has access to the whole input. That means all of the conditions have to be expressed as lookaheads (technically, one of them doesn't have to be a lookahead, I think it expresses the intent more clearly this way).  A final <code>.*$</code> consummates the match.</p>
<pre><code>/^(?=^abc)(?=.*xyz$)(?=.*123)(?=^(?:(?!456).)*$).*$/
</code></pre>
<p>And then there's the possibility of combined AND and OR conditions--that's where the real fun starts. :D</p>
</div>
<div class="mt24">
<div class="grid fw-wrap ai-start jc-end gs8 gsy">
<time datetime="2009-05-15T19:46:10" itemprop="dateCreated"></time>
<div class="grid--cell mr16" style="flex: 1 1 100px;">
<div class="js-post-menu pt2" data-post-id="870506">
<div class="grid d-flex gs8 s-anchors s-anchors__muted fw-wrap">
<div class="grid--cell">

<span class="comment-copy">Yes, I'm fine with OR now. But thanks for putting AND version. Combining AND and OR is not for me. :)</span>

<div class="comment-text js-comment-text-and-form">
<div class="comment-body js-comment-edit-hide">
<span class="comment-copy">I tried the last AND regex and I noticed it has a syntax error, an extra ")" at the end.  I removed this character but the regex didn't appear to work as intended, not sure what I did wrong? I'm using .Net to test.</span>
                
– <a class="comment-user" href="/users/743/ralph-willgoss" title="9,372 reputation">Ralph Willgoss</a>
<span class="comment-date" dir="ltr"><span class="relativetime-clean" title="2009-12-02 02:19:32Z, License: CC BY-SA 2.5">Dec 2 '09 at 2:19</span></span>
</div>
</div>
</li>
<li class="comment js-comment" data-comment-id="1722771" id="comment-1722771">
<div class="js-comment-actions comment-actions">
<div class="comment-score js-comment-edit-hide">
<span class="cool" title="number of 'useful comment' votes received">1</span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="comment-text js-comment-text-and-form">
<div class="comment-body js-comment-edit-hide">
<span class="comment-copy">It's actually the second-to-last <code>)</code> that doesn't belong there.  Once that's fixed, the reason it doesn't work is because there's nothing in it that consumes characters--it's all lookaheads. I could make the last part not a lookahead, but for clarity's sake I'd rather add a <code>.*</code> to the end.  I'm fixing it now; thanks for bringing it to my attention.</span>
                
– <a class="comment-user" href="/users/20938/alan-moore" title="67,933 reputation">Alan Moore</a>
<span class="comment-date" dir="ltr"><span class="relativetime-clean" title="2009-12-02 06:02:46Z, License: CC BY-SA 2.5">Dec 2 '09 at 6:02</span></span>

<a name="869835"></a>
<div class="answer" data-answerid="869835" id="answer-869835" itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Answer">
<div class="post-layout">
<div class="votecell post-layout--left">
<div class="js-voting-container grid jc-center fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="869835">
<button aria-label="Up vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This answer is useful"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowUpLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10 2 26z"></path></svg></button>
<div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" data-value="3" itemprop="upvoteCount">3</div>
<button aria-label="Down vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This answer is not useful"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowDownLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26 2 10z"></path></svg></button>
<div aria-label="Accepted" class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--cell fc-green-500 py6 mtn8 d-none" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" role="note" tabindex="0" title="Loading when this answer was accepted…">
<div class="ta-center">
<svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8v-8z"></path></svg>
</div>
</div>
<a aria-label="Timeline" class="js-post-issue grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer py6 mx-auto" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-shortcut="T" href="/posts/869835/timeline" title="Show activity on this post."><svg aria-hidden="true" class="mln2 mr0 svg-icon iconHistory" height="18" viewbox="0 0 19 18" width="19"><path d="M3 9a8 8 0 113.73 6.77L8.2 14.3A6 6 0 105 9l3.01-.01-4 4-4-4h3L3 9zm7-4h1.01L11 9.36l3.22 2.1-.6.93L10 10V5z"></path></svg></a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
<div class="s-prose js-post-body" itemprop="text">
<p>Doesn't contain @: /(^[^@]*$)/</p>
<p>Combining works if the intended result of combination is that any of them matching results in the whole regexp matching.</p>
</div>
<div class="mt24">
<div class="grid fw-wrap ai-start jc-end gs8 gsy">
<time datetime="2009-05-15T17:06:13" itemprop="dateCreated"></time>

<a name="869836"></a>
<div class="answer" data-answerid="869836" id="answer-869836" itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Answer">
<div class="post-layout">
<div class="votecell post-layout--left">
<div class="js-voting-container grid jc-center fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="869836">
<button aria-label="Up vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This answer is useful"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowUpLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10 2 26z"></path></svg></button>
<div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" data-value="3" itemprop="upvoteCount">3</div>
<button aria-label="Down vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This answer is not useful"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowDownLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26 2 10z"></path></svg></button>
<div aria-label="Accepted" class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--cell fc-green-500 py6 mtn8 d-none" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" role="note" tabindex="0" title="Loading when this answer was accepted…">
<div class="ta-center">
<svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8v-8z"></path></svg>
</div>
</div>
<a aria-label="Timeline" class="js-post-issue grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer py6 mx-auto" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-shortcut="T" href="/posts/869836/timeline" title="Show activity on this post."><svg aria-hidden="true" class="mln2 mr0 svg-icon iconHistory" height="18" viewbox="0 0 19 18" width="19"><path d="M3 9a8 8 0 113.73 6.77L8.2 14.3A6 6 0 105 9l3.01-.01-4 4-4-4h3L3 9zm7-4h1.01L11 9.36l3.22 2.1-.6.93L10 10V5z"></path></svg></a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
<div class="s-prose js-post-body" itemprop="text">
<p>If a string must not contain <code>@</code>, every character must be another character than <code>@</code>:</p>
<pre><code>/^[^@]*$/
</code></pre>
<p>This will match any string of any length that does not contain <code>@</code>.</p>
<p>Another possible solution would be to invert the boolean result of <code>/@/</code>.</p>
</div>
<div class="mt24">
<div class="grid fw-wrap ai-start jc-end gs8 gsy">
<time datetime="2009-05-15T17:06:16" itemprop="dateCreated"></time>
<div class="grid--cell mr16" style="flex: 1 1 100px;">

</div>

<div class="answer" data-answerid="869849" id="answer-869849" itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Answer">
<div class="post-layout">
<div class="votecell post-layout--left">
<div class="js-voting-container grid jc-center fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="869849">
<button aria-label="Up vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This answer is useful"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowUpLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10 2 26z"></path></svg></button>

<button aria-label="Down vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This answer is not useful"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowDownLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26 2 10z"></path></svg></button>
<div aria-label="Accepted" class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--cell fc-green-500 py6 mtn8 d-none" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" role="note" tabindex="0" title="Loading when this answer was accepted…">
<div class="ta-center">
<svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8v-8z"></path></svg>
</div>
</div>
<a aria-label="Timeline" class="js-post-issue grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer py6 mx-auto" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-shortcut="T" href="/posts/869849/timeline" title="Show activity on this post."><svg aria-hidden="true" class="mln2 mr0 svg-icon iconHistory" height="18" viewbox="0 0 19 18" width="19"><path d="M3 9a8 8 0 113.73 6.77L8.2 14.3A6 6 0 105 9l3.01-.01-4 4-4-4h3L3 9zm7-4h1.01L11 9.36l3.22 2.1-.6.93L10 10V5z"></path></svg></a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
<div class="s-prose js-post-body" itemprop="text">
<p>In my experience with regex you really need to focus on what EXACTLY you are trying to match, rather than what NOT to match.</p>
<p>for example </p>
<pre><code>\d{2}

[1-9][0-9]
</code></pre>
<p>The first expression will match any 2 digits....and the second will match 1 digit from 1 to 9 and 1 digit - any digit. So if you type 07 the first expression will validate it, but the second one will not.</p>
<p>See this for advanced reference:</p>
<p><a href="http://www.regular-expressions.info/refadv.html" rel="nofollow noreferrer">http://www.regular-expressions.info/refadv.html</a></p>
<p>EDITED:</p>
<p><code>^((?!my string).)*$</code> Is the regular expression for does not contain "my string". </p>
</div>
<div class="mt24">
<div class="grid fw-wrap ai-start jc-end gs8 gsy">
<time datetime="2009-05-15T17:10:01" itemprop="dateCreated"></time>

<span class="comment-copy">Can you give more detail on how "Doesn't contains" condition matched using above suggestion.</span>

<li class="comment js-comment" data-comment-id="677415" id="comment-677415">
<div class="js-comment-actions comment-actions">
<div class="comment-score js-comment-edit-hide">
<span class="cool" title="number of 'useful comment' votes received">1</span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="comment-text js-comment-text-and-form">
<div class="comment-body js-comment-edit-hide">
<span class="comment-copy">I assume you want an expression that "doesn't contain" something (it's not clear what you wish the expression not to contain). My suggestion show how you would do it if you don't want the expression to contain a digit 0 at the first position, in which which case you would limit the first position digit to 1-9.   It's not very clear what you mean by "doesn't contains". Doesn't contain what? Please clarify so we could help you. My answer was more of a general answer. Sorry if that didn't help you.</span>
                
– <a class="comment-user" href="/users/57997/sarsnake" title="22,844 reputation">sarsnake</a>

<a name="4006592"></a>
<div class="answer" data-answerid="4006592" id="answer-4006592" itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Answer">
<div class="post-layout">
<div class="votecell post-layout--left">
<div class="js-voting-container grid jc-center fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="4006592">
<button aria-label="Up vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This answer is useful"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowUpLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10 2 26z"></path></svg></button>
<div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" data-value="2" itemprop="upvoteCount">2</div>
<button aria-label="Down vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This answer is not useful"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowDownLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26 2 10z"></path></svg></button>
<div aria-label="Accepted" class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--cell fc-green-500 py6 mtn8 d-none" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" role="note" tabindex="0" title="Loading when this answer was accepted…">
<div class="ta-center">
<svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8v-8z"></path></svg>
</div>
</div>
<a aria-label="Timeline" class="js-post-issue grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer py6 mx-auto" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-shortcut="T" href="/posts/4006592/timeline" title="Show activity on this post."><svg aria-hidden="true" class="mln2 mr0 svg-icon iconHistory" height="18" viewbox="0 0 19 18" width="19"><path d="M3 9a8 8 0 113.73 6.77L8.2 14.3A6 6 0 105 9l3.01-.01-4 4-4-4h3L3 9zm7-4h1.01L11 9.36l3.22 2.1-.6.93L10 10V5z"></path></svg></a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
<div class="s-prose js-post-body" itemprop="text">
<p>1 + 2 + 4 conditions: starts|ends, but not in the middle</p>
<pre><code>/^@[^@]*@?$|^@?[^@]*@$/
</code></pre>
<p>is almost the same that:</p>
<pre><code>/^@?[^@]*@?$/
</code></pre>
<p>but this one matches any string without @, sample 'my name is hal9000'</p>
</div>
<div class="mt24">
<div class="grid fw-wrap ai-start jc-end gs8 gsy">
<time datetime="2010-10-23T23:38:55" itemprop="dateCreated"></time>
<div class="grid--cell mr16" style="flex: 1 1 100px;">

<a name="869884"></a>
<div class="answer" data-answerid="869884" id="answer-869884" itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Answer">
<div class="post-layout">
<div class="votecell post-layout--left">
<div class="js-voting-container grid jc-center fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="869884">
<button aria-label="Up vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This answer is useful"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowUpLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10 2 26z"></path></svg></button>
<div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" data-value="1" itemprop="upvoteCount">1</div>
<button aria-label="Down vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This answer is not useful"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowDownLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26 2 10z"></path></svg></button>
<div aria-label="Accepted" class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--cell fc-green-500 py6 mtn8 d-none" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" role="note" tabindex="0" title="Loading when this answer was accepted…">
<div class="ta-center">
<svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8v-8z"></path></svg>
</div>
</div>
<a aria-label="Timeline" class="js-post-issue grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer py6 mx-auto" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-shortcut="T" href="/posts/869884/timeline" title="Show activity on this post."><svg aria-hidden="true" class="mln2 mr0 svg-icon iconHistory" height="18" viewbox="0 0 19 18" width="19"><path d="M3 9a8 8 0 113.73 6.77L8.2 14.3A6 6 0 105 9l3.01-.01-4 4-4-4h3L3 9zm7-4h1.01L11 9.36l3.22 2.1-.6.93L10 10V5z"></path></svg></a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
<div class="s-prose js-post-body" itemprop="text">
<p>Combining the regex for the fourth option with any of the others doesn't work within one regex.  4 + 1 would mean either the string starts with @ or doesn't contain @ at all.  You're going to need two separate comparisons to do that.</p>
</div>
<div class="mt24">
<div class="grid fw-wrap ai-start jc-end gs8 gsy">
<time datetime="2009-05-15T17:16:56" itemprop="dateCreated"></time>
<div class="grid--cell mr16" style="flex: 1 1 100px;">
<div class="js-post-menu pt2" data-post-id="869884">

</div>

</div>

            </button>

<ul class="comments-list js-comments-list" data-addlink-disabled="true" data-canpost="false" data-cansee="true" data-comments-unavailable="false" data-remaining-comments-count="0">
<li class="comment js-comment" data-comment-id="677411" id="comment-677411">
<div class="js-comment-actions comment-actions">
<div class="comment-score js-comment-edit-hide">
</div>
</div>
<div class="comment-text js-comment-text-and-form">
<div class="comment-body js-comment-edit-hide">
<span class="comment-copy">@ won't be same for two conditions and not all four conditions always present but they can be and in future I might need more conditions like "is exactly" and "is exactly not" etc.   so, I'm more curious to know this approach will scale ?</span>

    StackExchange.ready(function() {

            tags: "".split(" "),

        };

                    createEditor();
                });

                createEditor();
            }

<script>
                            StackExchange.ready(function () {
                                StackExchange.helpers.onClickDraftSave('#login-link');

                                var $window = $(window),
                                    onScroll = function(e) {
                                        var $elem = $('.new-login-left'),
                                            docViewTop = $window.scrollTop(),
                                            docViewBottom = docViewTop + $window.height(),
                                            elemTop = $elem.offset().top,
                                            elemBottom = elemTop + $elem.height();
                                        if ((docViewTop < elemTop) && (docViewBottom > elemBottom))  {
                                            StackExchange.using('gps', function() { StackExchange.gps.track('embedded_signup_form.view', { location: 'question_page' }); });
                                            $window.unbind('scroll', onScroll);
                                        }
                                    };
                                $window.on('scroll', onScroll);
                                                                });
                        </script>

                </a>
</div><div class="ps-absolute t8 r8">
<svg aria-hidden="true" class="fc-orange-500 svg-spot spotPeople" height="48" viewbox="0 0 48 48" width="48"><path d="M13.5 28a4.5 4.5 0 100-9 4.5 4.5 0 000 9zM7 30a1 1 0 011-1h11a1 1 0 011 1v5h11v-5a1 1 0 011-1h12a1 1 0 011 1v10a2 2 0 01-2 2H33v5a1 1 0 01-1 1H20a1 1 0 01-1-1v-5H8a1 1 0 01-1-1V30zm25-6.5a4.5 4.5 0 109 0 4.5 4.5 0 00-9 0zM24.5 34a4.5 4.5 0 100-9 4.5 4.5 0 000 9z" opacity=".2"></path><path d="M16.4 26.08A6 6 0 107.53 26C5.64 26.06 4 27.52 4 29.45V40a1 1 0 001 1h9a1 1 0 100-2h-4v-7a1 1 0 10-2 0v7H6v-9.55c0-.73.67-1.45 1.64-1.45H16a1 1 0 00.4-1.92zM12 18a4 4 0 110 8 4 4 0 010-8zm16.47 14a6 6 0 10-8.94 0A3.6 3.6 0 0016 35.5V46a1 1 0 001 1h14a1 1 0 001-1V35.5c0-1.94-1.64-3.42-3.53-3.5zM20 28a4 4 0 118 0 4 4 0 01-8 0zm-.3 6h8.6c1 0 1.7.75 1.7 1.5V45h-2v-7a1 1 0 10-2 0v7h-4v-7a1 1 0 10-2 0v7h-2v-9.5c0-.75.7-1.5 1.7-1.5zM42 22c0 1.54-.58 2.94-1.53 4A3.5 3.5 0 0144 29.45V40a1 1 0 01-1 1h-9a1 1 0 110-2h4v-7a1 1 0 112 0v7h2v-9.55A1.5 1.5 0 0040.48 28H32a1 1 0 01-.4-1.92A6 6 0 1142 22zm-2 0a4 4 0 10-8 0 4 4 0 008 0z"></path><path d="M17 10a1 1 0 011-1h12a1 1 0 110 2H18a1 1 0 01-1-1zm1-5a1 1 0 100 2h12a1 1 0 100-2H18zm-4-4a1 1 0 00-1 1v12a1 1 0 001 1h5.09l4.2 4.2a1 1 0 001.46-.04l3.7-4.16H34a1 1 0 001-1V2a1 1 0 00-1-1H14zm1 12V3h18v10h-5a1 1 0 00-.75.34l-3.3 3.7-3.74-3.75a1 1 0 00-.71-.29H15z" opacity=".35"></path></svg>
</div><div class="snippet-hidden" id="content">

<h1 class="fs-headline1 ow-break-word mb8 grid--cell fl1" itemprop="name"><a class="question-hyperlink" href="/questions/869809/combine-regexp">Combine Regexp?</a></h1>
<div class="ml12 aside-cta grid--cell print:d-none sm:ml0 sm:mb12 sm:order-first sm:as-end">
<a class="ws-nowrap s-btn s-btn__primary" href="/questions/ask">
        Ask Question
    </a>
</div>

<div class="grid fw-wrap pb8 mb16 bb bc-black-075">
<div class="grid--cell ws-nowrap mr16 mb8" title="2009-05-15 17:01:42Z">

</style>
<div class="js-zone-container zone-container-main">

<div class="post-layout">
<div class="votecell post-layout--left">
<div class="js-voting-container grid jc-center fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="869809">
<button aria-label="Up vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This question shows research effort; it is useful and clear"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowUpLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10 2 26z"></path></svg></button>
<div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" data-value="60" itemprop="upvoteCount">60</div>
<button aria-label="Down vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This question does not show any research effort; it is unclear or not useful"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowDownLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26 2 10z"></path></svg></button>
<button aria-label="Bookmark (39)" aria-pressed="false" class="js-bookmark-btn s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer py4 js-gps-track" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-gps-track="post.click({ item: 1, priv: 0, post_type: 1 })" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-yellow-600" title="Bookmark this question.">
<svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconBookmark" height="18" viewbox="0 0 18 18" width="18"><path d="M6 1a2 2 0 00-2 2v14l5-4 5 4V3a2 2 0 00-2-2H6zm3.9 3.83h2.9l-2.35 1.7.9 2.77L9 7.59l-2.35 1.7.9-2.76-2.35-1.7h2.9L9 2.06l.9 2.77z"></path></svg>
<div class="js-bookmark-count mt4" data-value="39">39</div>
</button>
<a aria-label="Timeline" class="js-post-issue grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer py6 mx-auto" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-shortcut="T" href="/posts/869809/timeline" title="Show activity on this post."><svg aria-hidden="true" class="mln2 mr0 svg-icon iconHistory" height="18" viewbox="0 0 19 18" width="19"><path d="M3 9a8 8 0 113.73 6.77L8.2 14.3A6 6 0 105 9l3.01-.01-4 4-4-4h3L3 9zm7-4h1.01L11 9.36l3.22 2.1-.6.93L10 10V5z"></path></svg></a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="postcell post-layout--right">
<div class="s-prose js-post-body" itemprop="text">
<p>After collecting user input for various conditions like</p>
<ol>
<li>Starts with : <code>/(^@)/</code></li>
<li>Ends with : <code>/(@$)/</code></li>
<li>Contains : <code>/@/</code></li>
<li>Doesn't contains</li>
</ol>
<p>To make single regex if user enter multiple conditions,
I combine them with <code>"|"</code> so if 1 and 2 given it become <code>/(^@)|(@$)/</code></p>
<p>This method works so far but,</p>
<p>I'm not able to determine correctly, What should be regex for 4 the condition? And combining regex this way work?</p>
<hr/>
<blockquote>
<p>Update: @(user input) won't be same
  for two conditions and not all four
  conditions always present but they can
  be and in future I might need more
  conditions like "is exactly" and "is
  exactly not" etc. so, I'm more curious
  to know this approach will scale ?</p>
<p>Also there may be issues of user input
  cleanup so regex escaped properly, but
  that is ignored right now.</p>
</blockquote>
</div>
<div class="mt24 mb12">

<a name="870506"></a>
<div class="answer accepted-answer" data-answerid="870506" id="answer-870506" itemprop="acceptedAnswer" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Answer">
<div class="post-layout">
<div class="votecell post-layout--left">
<div class="js-voting-container grid jc-center fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="870506">
<button aria-label="Up vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This answer is useful"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowUpLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10 2 26z"></path></svg></button>
<div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" data-value="104" itemprop="upvoteCount">104</div>
<button aria-label="Down vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This answer is not useful"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowDownLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26 2 10z"></path></svg></button>
<div aria-label="Accepted" class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--cell fc-green-500 py6 mtn8" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" role="note" tabindex="0" title="Loading when this answer was accepted…">
<div class="ta-center">
<svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8v-8z"></path></svg>
</div>
</div>
<a aria-label="Timeline" class="js-post-issue grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer py6 mx-auto" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-shortcut="T" href="/posts/870506/timeline" title="Show activity on this post."><svg aria-hidden="true" class="mln2 mr0 svg-icon iconHistory" height="18" viewbox="0 0 19 18" width="19"><path d="M3 9a8 8 0 113.73 6.77L8.2 14.3A6 6 0 105 9l3.01-.01-4 4-4-4h3L3 9zm7-4h1.01L11 9.36l3.22 2.1-.6.93L10 10V5z"></path></svg></a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
<div class="s-prose js-post-body" itemprop="text">
<p>Will the conditions be ORed or ANDed together?</p>
<pre>Starts with: abc
Ends with: xyz
Contains: 123
Doesn't contain: 456</pre>
<p>The OR version is fairly simple; as you said, it's mostly a matter of inserting pipes between individual conditions.  The regex simply stops looking for a match as soon as one of the alternatives matches.</p>
<pre><code>/^abc|xyz$|123|^(?:(?!456).)*$/
</code></pre>
<p>That fourth alternative may look bizarre, but that's how you express "doesn't contain" in a regex.  By the way, the order of the alternatives doesn't matter; this is effectively the same regex:</p>
<pre><code>/xyz$|^(?:(?!456).)*$|123|^abc/
</code></pre>
<p>The AND version is more complicated.  After each individual regex matches, the match position has to be reset to zero so the next regex has access to the whole input. That means all of the conditions have to be expressed as lookaheads (technically, one of them doesn't have to be a lookahead, I think it expresses the intent more clearly this way).  A final <code>.*$</code> consummates the match.</p>
<pre><code>/^(?=^abc)(?=.*xyz$)(?=.*123)(?=^(?:(?!456).)*$).*$/
</code></pre>
<p>And then there's the possibility of combined AND and OR conditions--that's where the real fun starts. :D</p>
</div>
<div class="mt24">
<div class="grid fw-wrap ai-start jc-end gs8 gsy">
<time datetime="2009-05-15T19:46:10" itemprop="dateCreated"></time>
<div class="grid--cell mr16" style="flex: 1 1 100px;">
<div class="js-post-menu pt2" data-post-id="870506">
<div class="grid d-flex gs8 s-anchors s-anchors__muted fw-wrap">
<div class="grid--cell">

<span class="comment-copy">Yes, I'm fine with OR now. But thanks for putting AND version. Combining AND and OR is not for me. :)</span>

<div class="comment-text js-comment-text-and-form">
<div class="comment-body js-comment-edit-hide">
<span class="comment-copy">I tried the last AND regex and I noticed it has a syntax error, an extra ")" at the end.  I removed this character but the regex didn't appear to work as intended, not sure what I did wrong? I'm using .Net to test.</span>
                
– <a class="comment-user" href="/users/743/ralph-willgoss" title="9,372 reputation">Ralph Willgoss</a>
<span class="comment-date" dir="ltr"><span class="relativetime-clean" title="2009-12-02 02:19:32Z, License: CC BY-SA 2.5">Dec 2 '09 at 2:19</span></span>
</div>
</div>
</li>
<li class="comment js-comment" data-comment-id="1722771" id="comment-1722771">
<div class="js-comment-actions comment-actions">
<div class="comment-score js-comment-edit-hide">
<span class="cool" title="number of 'useful comment' votes received">1</span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="comment-text js-comment-text-and-form">
<div class="comment-body js-comment-edit-hide">
<span class="comment-copy">It's actually the second-to-last <code>)</code> that doesn't belong there.  Once that's fixed, the reason it doesn't work is because there's nothing in it that consumes characters--it's all lookaheads. I could make the last part not a lookahead, but for clarity's sake I'd rather add a <code>.*</code> to the end.  I'm fixing it now; thanks for bringing it to my attention.</span>
                
– <a class="comment-user" href="/users/20938/alan-moore" title="67,933 reputation">Alan Moore</a>
<span class="comment-date" dir="ltr"><span class="relativetime-clean" title="2009-12-02 06:02:46Z, License: CC BY-SA 2.5">Dec 2 '09 at 6:02</span></span>

<a name="869835"></a>
<div class="answer" data-answerid="869835" id="answer-869835" itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Answer">
<div class="post-layout">
<div class="votecell post-layout--left">
<div class="js-voting-container grid jc-center fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="869835">
<button aria-label="Up vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This answer is useful"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowUpLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10 2 26z"></path></svg></button>
<div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" data-value="3" itemprop="upvoteCount">3</div>
<button aria-label="Down vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This answer is not useful"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowDownLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26 2 10z"></path></svg></button>
<div aria-label="Accepted" class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--cell fc-green-500 py6 mtn8 d-none" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" role="note" tabindex="0" title="Loading when this answer was accepted…">
<div class="ta-center">
<svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8v-8z"></path></svg>
</div>
</div>
<a aria-label="Timeline" class="js-post-issue grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer py6 mx-auto" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-shortcut="T" href="/posts/869835/timeline" title="Show activity on this post."><svg aria-hidden="true" class="mln2 mr0 svg-icon iconHistory" height="18" viewbox="0 0 19 18" width="19"><path d="M3 9a8 8 0 113.73 6.77L8.2 14.3A6 6 0 105 9l3.01-.01-4 4-4-4h3L3 9zm7-4h1.01L11 9.36l3.22 2.1-.6.93L10 10V5z"></path></svg></a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
<div class="s-prose js-post-body" itemprop="text">
<p>Doesn't contain @: /(^[^@]*$)/</p>
<p>Combining works if the intended result of combination is that any of them matching results in the whole regexp matching.</p>
</div>
<div class="mt24">
<div class="grid fw-wrap ai-start jc-end gs8 gsy">
<time datetime="2009-05-15T17:06:13" itemprop="dateCreated"></time>

<a name="869836"></a>
<div class="answer" data-answerid="869836" id="answer-869836" itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Answer">
<div class="post-layout">
<div class="votecell post-layout--left">
<div class="js-voting-container grid jc-center fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="869836">
<button aria-label="Up vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This answer is useful"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowUpLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10 2 26z"></path></svg></button>
<div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" data-value="3" itemprop="upvoteCount">3</div>
<button aria-label="Down vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This answer is not useful"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowDownLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26 2 10z"></path></svg></button>
<div aria-label="Accepted" class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--cell fc-green-500 py6 mtn8 d-none" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" role="note" tabindex="0" title="Loading when this answer was accepted…">
<div class="ta-center">
<svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8v-8z"></path></svg>
</div>
</div>
<a aria-label="Timeline" class="js-post-issue grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer py6 mx-auto" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-shortcut="T" href="/posts/869836/timeline" title="Show activity on this post."><svg aria-hidden="true" class="mln2 mr0 svg-icon iconHistory" height="18" viewbox="0 0 19 18" width="19"><path d="M3 9a8 8 0 113.73 6.77L8.2 14.3A6 6 0 105 9l3.01-.01-4 4-4-4h3L3 9zm7-4h1.01L11 9.36l3.22 2.1-.6.93L10 10V5z"></path></svg></a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
<div class="s-prose js-post-body" itemprop="text">
<p>If a string must not contain <code>@</code>, every character must be another character than <code>@</code>:</p>
<pre><code>/^[^@]*$/
</code></pre>
<p>This will match any string of any length that does not contain <code>@</code>.</p>
<p>Another possible solution would be to invert the boolean result of <code>/@/</code>.</p>
</div>
<div class="mt24">
<div class="grid fw-wrap ai-start jc-end gs8 gsy">
<time datetime="2009-05-15T17:06:16" itemprop="dateCreated"></time>
<div class="grid--cell mr16" style="flex: 1 1 100px;">

</div>

<div class="answer" data-answerid="869849" id="answer-869849" itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Answer">
<div class="post-layout">
<div class="votecell post-layout--left">
<div class="js-voting-container grid jc-center fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="869849">
<button aria-label="Up vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This answer is useful"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowUpLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10 2 26z"></path></svg></button>

<button aria-label="Down vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This answer is not useful"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowDownLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26 2 10z"></path></svg></button>
<div aria-label="Accepted" class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--cell fc-green-500 py6 mtn8 d-none" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" role="note" tabindex="0" title="Loading when this answer was accepted…">
<div class="ta-center">
<svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8v-8z"></path></svg>
</div>
</div>
<a aria-label="Timeline" class="js-post-issue grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer py6 mx-auto" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-shortcut="T" href="/posts/869849/timeline" title="Show activity on this post."><svg aria-hidden="true" class="mln2 mr0 svg-icon iconHistory" height="18" viewbox="0 0 19 18" width="19"><path d="M3 9a8 8 0 113.73 6.77L8.2 14.3A6 6 0 105 9l3.01-.01-4 4-4-4h3L3 9zm7-4h1.01L11 9.36l3.22 2.1-.6.93L10 10V5z"></path></svg></a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
<div class="s-prose js-post-body" itemprop="text">
<p>In my experience with regex you really need to focus on what EXACTLY you are trying to match, rather than what NOT to match.</p>
<p>for example </p>
<pre><code>\d{2}

[1-9][0-9]
</code></pre>
<p>The first expression will match any 2 digits....and the second will match 1 digit from 1 to 9 and 1 digit - any digit. So if you type 07 the first expression will validate it, but the second one will not.</p>
<p>See this for advanced reference:</p>
<p><a href="http://www.regular-expressions.info/refadv.html" rel="nofollow noreferrer">http://www.regular-expressions.info/refadv.html</a></p>
<p>EDITED:</p>
<p><code>^((?!my string).)*$</code> Is the regular expression for does not contain "my string". </p>
</div>
<div class="mt24">
<div class="grid fw-wrap ai-start jc-end gs8 gsy">
<time datetime="2009-05-15T17:10:01" itemprop="dateCreated"></time>

<span class="comment-copy">Can you give more detail on how "Doesn't contains" condition matched using above suggestion.</span>

<li class="comment js-comment" data-comment-id="677415" id="comment-677415">
<div class="js-comment-actions comment-actions">
<div class="comment-score js-comment-edit-hide">
<span class="cool" title="number of 'useful comment' votes received">1</span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="comment-text js-comment-text-and-form">
<div class="comment-body js-comment-edit-hide">
<span class="comment-copy">I assume you want an expression that "doesn't contain" something (it's not clear what you wish the expression not to contain). My suggestion show how you would do it if you don't want the expression to contain a digit 0 at the first position, in which which case you would limit the first position digit to 1-9.   It's not very clear what you mean by "doesn't contains". Doesn't contain what? Please clarify so we could help you. My answer was more of a general answer. Sorry if that didn't help you.</span>
                
– <a class="comment-user" href="/users/57997/sarsnake" title="22,844 reputation">sarsnake</a>

<a name="4006592"></a>
<div class="answer" data-answerid="4006592" id="answer-4006592" itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Answer">
<div class="post-layout">
<div class="votecell post-layout--left">
<div class="js-voting-container grid jc-center fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="4006592">
<button aria-label="Up vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This answer is useful"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowUpLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10 2 26z"></path></svg></button>
<div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" data-value="2" itemprop="upvoteCount">2</div>
<button aria-label="Down vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This answer is not useful"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowDownLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26 2 10z"></path></svg></button>
<div aria-label="Accepted" class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--cell fc-green-500 py6 mtn8 d-none" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" role="note" tabindex="0" title="Loading when this answer was accepted…">
<div class="ta-center">
<svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8v-8z"></path></svg>
</div>
</div>
<a aria-label="Timeline" class="js-post-issue grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer py6 mx-auto" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-shortcut="T" href="/posts/4006592/timeline" title="Show activity on this post."><svg aria-hidden="true" class="mln2 mr0 svg-icon iconHistory" height="18" viewbox="0 0 19 18" width="19"><path d="M3 9a8 8 0 113.73 6.77L8.2 14.3A6 6 0 105 9l3.01-.01-4 4-4-4h3L3 9zm7-4h1.01L11 9.36l3.22 2.1-.6.93L10 10V5z"></path></svg></a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
<div class="s-prose js-post-body" itemprop="text">
<p>1 + 2 + 4 conditions: starts|ends, but not in the middle</p>
<pre><code>/^@[^@]*@?$|^@?[^@]*@$/
</code></pre>
<p>is almost the same that:</p>
<pre><code>/^@?[^@]*@?$/
</code></pre>
<p>but this one matches any string without @, sample 'my name is hal9000'</p>
</div>
<div class="mt24">
<div class="grid fw-wrap ai-start jc-end gs8 gsy">
<time datetime="2010-10-23T23:38:55" itemprop="dateCreated"></time>
<div class="grid--cell mr16" style="flex: 1 1 100px;">

<a name="869884"></a>
<div class="answer" data-answerid="869884" id="answer-869884" itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Answer">
<div class="post-layout">
<div class="votecell post-layout--left">
<div class="js-voting-container grid jc-center fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="869884">
<button aria-label="Up vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This answer is useful"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowUpLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10 2 26z"></path></svg></button>
<div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" data-value="1" itemprop="upvoteCount">1</div>
<button aria-label="Down vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This answer is not useful"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowDownLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26 2 10z"></path></svg></button>
<div aria-label="Accepted" class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--cell fc-green-500 py6 mtn8 d-none" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" role="note" tabindex="0" title="Loading when this answer was accepted…">
<div class="ta-center">
<svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8v-8z"></path></svg>
</div>
</div>
<a aria-label="Timeline" class="js-post-issue grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer py6 mx-auto" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-shortcut="T" href="/posts/869884/timeline" title="Show activity on this post."><svg aria-hidden="true" class="mln2 mr0 svg-icon iconHistory" height="18" viewbox="0 0 19 18" width="19"><path d="M3 9a8 8 0 113.73 6.77L8.2 14.3A6 6 0 105 9l3.01-.01-4 4-4-4h3L3 9zm7-4h1.01L11 9.36l3.22 2.1-.6.93L10 10V5z"></path></svg></a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
<div class="s-prose js-post-body" itemprop="text">
<p>Combining the regex for the fourth option with any of the others doesn't work within one regex.  4 + 1 would mean either the string starts with @ or doesn't contain @ at all.  You're going to need two separate comparisons to do that.</p>
</div>
<div class="mt24">
<div class="grid fw-wrap ai-start jc-end gs8 gsy">
<time datetime="2009-05-15T17:16:56" itemprop="dateCreated"></time>
<div class="grid--cell mr16" style="flex: 1 1 100px;">
<div class="js-post-menu pt2" data-post-id="869884">

</div>

</div>

            </button>

<ul class="comments-list js-comments-list" data-addlink-disabled="true" data-canpost="false" data-cansee="true" data-comments-unavailable="false" data-remaining-comments-count="0">
<li class="comment js-comment" data-comment-id="677411" id="comment-677411">
<div class="js-comment-actions comment-actions">
<div class="comment-score js-comment-edit-hide">
</div>
</div>
<div class="comment-text js-comment-text-and-form">
<div class="comment-body js-comment-edit-hide">
<span class="comment-copy">@ won't be same for two conditions and not all four conditions always present but they can be and in future I might need more conditions like "is exactly" and "is exactly not" etc.   so, I'm more curious to know this approach will scale ?</span>

    StackExchange.ready(function() {

            tags: "".split(" "),

        };

                    createEditor();
                });

                createEditor();
            }

<script>
                            StackExchange.ready(function () {
                                StackExchange.helpers.onClickDraftSave('#login-link');

                                var $window = $(window),
                                    onScroll = function(e) {
                                        var $elem = $('.new-login-left'),
                                            docViewTop = $window.scrollTop(),
                                            docViewBottom = docViewTop + $window.height(),
                                            elemTop = $elem.offset().top,
                                            elemBottom = elemTop + $elem.height();
                                        if ((docViewTop < elemTop) && (docViewBottom > elemBottom))  {
                                            StackExchange.using('gps', function() { StackExchange.gps.track('embedded_signup_form.view', { location: 'question_page' }); });
                                            $window.unbind('scroll', onScroll);
                                        }
                                    };
                                $window.on('scroll', onScroll);
                                                                });
                        </script>

<div class="votecell post-layout--left">
<div class="js-voting-container grid jc-center fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="869809">
<button aria-label="Up vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This question shows research effort; it is useful and clear"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowUpLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10 2 26z"></path></svg></button>
<div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" data-value="60" itemprop="upvoteCount">60</div>
<button aria-label="Down vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This question does not show any research effort; it is unclear or not useful"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowDownLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26 2 10z"></path></svg></button>
<button aria-label="Bookmark (39)" aria-pressed="false" class="js-bookmark-btn s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer py4 js-gps-track" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-gps-track="post.click({ item: 1, priv: 0, post_type: 1 })" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-yellow-600" title="Bookmark this question.">
<svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconBookmark" height="18" viewbox="0 0 18 18" width="18"><path d="M6 1a2 2 0 00-2 2v14l5-4 5 4V3a2 2 0 00-2-2H6zm3.9 3.83h2.9l-2.35 1.7.9 2.77L9 7.59l-2.35 1.7.9-2.76-2.35-1.7h2.9L9 2.06l.9 2.77z"></path></svg>
<div class="js-bookmark-count mt4" data-value="39">39</div>
</button>
<a aria-label="Timeline" class="js-post-issue grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer py6 mx-auto" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-shortcut="T" href="/posts/869809/timeline" title="Show activity on this post."><svg aria-hidden="true" class="mln2 mr0 svg-icon iconHistory" height="18" viewbox="0 0 19 18" width="19"><path d="M3 9a8 8 0 113.73 6.77L8.2 14.3A6 6 0 105 9l3.01-.01-4 4-4-4h3L3 9zm7-4h1.01L11 9.36l3.22 2.1-.6.93L10 10V5z"></path></svg></a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="postcell post-layout--right">
<div class="s-prose js-post-body" itemprop="text">
<p>After collecting user input for various conditions like</p>
<ol>
<li>Starts with : <code>/(^@)/</code></li>
<li>Ends with : <code>/(@$)/</code></li>
<li>Contains : <code>/@/</code></li>
<li>Doesn't contains</li>
</ol>
<p>To make single regex if user enter multiple conditions,
I combine them with <code>"|"</code> so if 1 and 2 given it become <code>/(^@)|(@$)/</code></p>
<p>This method works so far but,</p>
<p>I'm not able to determine correctly, What should be regex for 4 the condition? And combining regex this way work?</p>
<hr/>
<blockquote>
<p>Update: @(user input) won't be same
  for two conditions and not all four
  conditions always present but they can
  be and in future I might need more
  conditions like "is exactly" and "is
  exactly not" etc. so, I'm more curious
  to know this approach will scale ?</p>
<p>Also there may be issues of user input
  cleanup so regex escaped properly, but
  that is ignored right now.</p>
</blockquote>
</div>
<div class="mt24 mb12">

<div class="grid ps-relative">
<a class="post-tag" href="/questions/tagged/regex" rel="tag" title="show questions tagged 'regex'">regex</a>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<a name="870506"></a>
<div class="answer accepted-answer" data-answerid="870506" id="answer-870506" itemprop="acceptedAnswer" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Answer">
<div class="post-layout">
<div class="votecell post-layout--left">
<div class="js-voting-container grid jc-center fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="870506">
<button aria-label="Up vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This answer is useful"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowUpLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10 2 26z"></path></svg></button>
<div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" data-value="104" itemprop="upvoteCount">104</div>
<button aria-label="Down vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This answer is not useful"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowDownLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26 2 10z"></path></svg></button>
<div aria-label="Accepted" class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--cell fc-green-500 py6 mtn8" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" role="note" tabindex="0" title="Loading when this answer was accepted…">
<div class="ta-center">
<svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8v-8z"></path></svg>
</div>
</div>
<a aria-label="Timeline" class="js-post-issue grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer py6 mx-auto" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-shortcut="T" href="/posts/870506/timeline" title="Show activity on this post."><svg aria-hidden="true" class="mln2 mr0 svg-icon iconHistory" height="18" viewbox="0 0 19 18" width="19"><path d="M3 9a8 8 0 113.73 6.77L8.2 14.3A6 6 0 105 9l3.01-.01-4 4-4-4h3L3 9zm7-4h1.01L11 9.36l3.22 2.1-.6.93L10 10V5z"></path></svg></a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
<div class="s-prose js-post-body" itemprop="text">
<p>Will the conditions be ORed or ANDed together?</p>
<pre>Starts with: abc
Ends with: xyz
Contains: 123
Doesn't contain: 456</pre>
<p>The OR version is fairly simple; as you said, it's mostly a matter of inserting pipes between individual conditions.  The regex simply stops looking for a match as soon as one of the alternatives matches.</p>
<pre><code>/^abc|xyz$|123|^(?:(?!456).)*$/
</code></pre>
<p>That fourth alternative may look bizarre, but that's how you express "doesn't contain" in a regex.  By the way, the order of the alternatives doesn't matter; this is effectively the same regex:</p>
<pre><code>/xyz$|^(?:(?!456).)*$|123|^abc/
</code></pre>
<p>The AND version is more complicated.  After each individual regex matches, the match position has to be reset to zero so the next regex has access to the whole input. That means all of the conditions have to be expressed as lookaheads (technically, one of them doesn't have to be a lookahead, I think it expresses the intent more clearly this way).  A final <code>.*$</code> consummates the match.</p>
<pre><code>/^(?=^abc)(?=.*xyz$)(?=.*123)(?=^(?:(?!456).)*$).*$/
</code></pre>
<p>And then there's the possibility of combined AND and OR conditions--that's where the real fun starts. :D</p>
</div>
<div class="mt24">
<div class="grid fw-wrap ai-start jc-end gs8 gsy">
<time datetime="2009-05-15T19:46:10" itemprop="dateCreated"></time>

<li class="comment js-comment" data-comment-id="1722013" id="comment-1722013">
<div class="js-comment-actions comment-actions">
<div class="comment-score js-comment-edit-hide">
<span class="cool" title="number of 'useful comment' votes received">1</span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="comment-text js-comment-text-and-form">
<div class="comment-body js-comment-edit-hide">
<span class="comment-copy">I tried the last AND regex and I noticed it has a syntax error, an extra ")" at the end.  I removed this character but the regex didn't appear to work as intended, not sure what I did wrong? I'm using .Net to test.</span>
                
– <a class="comment-user" href="/users/743/ralph-willgoss" title="9,372 reputation">Ralph Willgoss</a>
<span class="comment-date" dir="ltr"><span class="relativetime-clean" title="2009-12-02 02:19:32Z, License: CC BY-SA 2.5">Dec 2 '09 at 2:19</span></span>
</div>
</div>
</li>
<li class="comment js-comment" data-comment-id="1722771" id="comment-1722771">
<div class="js-comment-actions comment-actions">
<div class="comment-score js-comment-edit-hide">
<span class="cool" title="number of 'useful comment' votes received">1</span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="comment-text js-comment-text-and-form">
<div class="comment-body js-comment-edit-hide">
<span class="comment-copy">It's actually the second-to-last <code>)</code> that doesn't belong there.  Once that's fixed, the reason it doesn't work is because there's nothing in it that consumes characters--it's all lookaheads. I could make the last part not a lookahead, but for clarity's sake I'd rather add a <code>.*</code> to the end.  I'm fixing it now; thanks for bringing it to my attention.</span>
                
– <a class="comment-user" href="/users/20938/alan-moore" title="67,933 reputation">Alan Moore</a>
<span class="comment-date" dir="ltr"><span class="relativetime-clean" title="2009-12-02 06:02:46Z, License: CC BY-SA 2.5">Dec 2 '09 at 6:02</span></span>
</div>
</div>
</li>
</ul>
</div>

<a name="869835"></a>
<div class="answer" data-answerid="869835" id="answer-869835" itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Answer">
<div class="post-layout">
<div class="votecell post-layout--left">
<div class="js-voting-container grid jc-center fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="869835">
<button aria-label="Up vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This answer is useful"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowUpLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10 2 26z"></path></svg></button>
<div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" data-value="3" itemprop="upvoteCount">3</div>
<button aria-label="Down vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This answer is not useful"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowDownLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26 2 10z"></path></svg></button>
<div aria-label="Accepted" class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--cell fc-green-500 py6 mtn8 d-none" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" role="note" tabindex="0" title="Loading when this answer was accepted…">
<div class="ta-center">
<svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8v-8z"></path></svg>
</div>
</div>
<a aria-label="Timeline" class="js-post-issue grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer py6 mx-auto" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-shortcut="T" href="/posts/869835/timeline" title="Show activity on this post."><svg aria-hidden="true" class="mln2 mr0 svg-icon iconHistory" height="18" viewbox="0 0 19 18" width="19"><path d="M3 9a8 8 0 113.73 6.77L8.2 14.3A6 6 0 105 9l3.01-.01-4 4-4-4h3L3 9zm7-4h1.01L11 9.36l3.22 2.1-.6.93L10 10V5z"></path></svg></a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
<div class="s-prose js-post-body" itemprop="text">
<p>Doesn't contain @: /(^[^@]*$)/</p>
<p>Combining works if the intended result of combination is that any of them matching results in the whole regexp matching.</p>
</div>
<div class="mt24">
<div class="grid fw-wrap ai-start jc-end gs8 gsy">

<a name="869836"></a>
<div class="answer" data-answerid="869836" id="answer-869836" itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Answer">
<div class="post-layout">
<div class="votecell post-layout--left">
<div class="js-voting-container grid jc-center fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="869836">
<button aria-label="Up vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This answer is useful"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowUpLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10 2 26z"></path></svg></button>
<div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" data-value="3" itemprop="upvoteCount">3</div>
<button aria-label="Down vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This answer is not useful"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowDownLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26 2 10z"></path></svg></button>
<div aria-label="Accepted" class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--cell fc-green-500 py6 mtn8 d-none" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" role="note" tabindex="0" title="Loading when this answer was accepted…">
<div class="ta-center">
<svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8v-8z"></path></svg>
</div>
</div>
<a aria-label="Timeline" class="js-post-issue grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer py6 mx-auto" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-shortcut="T" href="/posts/869836/timeline" title="Show activity on this post."><svg aria-hidden="true" class="mln2 mr0 svg-icon iconHistory" height="18" viewbox="0 0 19 18" width="19"><path d="M3 9a8 8 0 113.73 6.77L8.2 14.3A6 6 0 105 9l3.01-.01-4 4-4-4h3L3 9zm7-4h1.01L11 9.36l3.22 2.1-.6.93L10 10V5z"></path></svg></a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
<div class="s-prose js-post-body" itemprop="text">
<p>If a string must not contain <code>@</code>, every character must be another character than <code>@</code>:</p>
<pre><code>/^[^@]*$/
</code></pre>
<p>This will match any string of any length that does not contain <code>@</code>.</p>
<p>Another possible solution would be to invert the boolean result of <code>/@/</code>.</p>
</div>
<div class="mt24">
<div class="grid fw-wrap ai-start jc-end gs8 gsy">
<time datetime="2009-05-15T17:06:16" itemprop="dateCreated"></time>

<a name="869849"></a>
<div class="answer" data-answerid="869849" id="answer-869849" itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Answer">
<div class="post-layout">
<div class="votecell post-layout--left">
<div class="js-voting-container grid jc-center fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="869849">
<button aria-label="Up vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This answer is useful"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowUpLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10 2 26z"></path></svg></button>
<div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" data-value="2" itemprop="upvoteCount">2</div>
<button aria-label="Down vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This answer is not useful"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowDownLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26 2 10z"></path></svg></button>
<div aria-label="Accepted" class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--cell fc-green-500 py6 mtn8 d-none" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" role="note" tabindex="0" title="Loading when this answer was accepted…">
<div class="ta-center">
<svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8v-8z"></path></svg>
</div>
</div>
<a aria-label="Timeline" class="js-post-issue grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer py6 mx-auto" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-shortcut="T" href="/posts/869849/timeline" title="Show activity on this post."><svg aria-hidden="true" class="mln2 mr0 svg-icon iconHistory" height="18" viewbox="0 0 19 18" width="19"><path d="M3 9a8 8 0 113.73 6.77L8.2 14.3A6 6 0 105 9l3.01-.01-4 4-4-4h3L3 9zm7-4h1.01L11 9.36l3.22 2.1-.6.93L10 10V5z"></path></svg></a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
<div class="s-prose js-post-body" itemprop="text">
<p>In my experience with regex you really need to focus on what EXACTLY you are trying to match, rather than what NOT to match.</p>
<p>for example </p>
<pre><code>\d{2}

[1-9][0-9]
</code></pre>
<p>The first expression will match any 2 digits....and the second will match 1 digit from 1 to 9 and 1 digit - any digit. So if you type 07 the first expression will validate it, but the second one will not.</p>
<p>See this for advanced reference:</p>
<p><a href="http://www.regular-expressions.info/refadv.html" rel="nofollow noreferrer">http://www.regular-expressions.info/refadv.html</a></p>
<p>EDITED:</p>
<p><code>^((?!my string).)*$</code> Is the regular expression for does not contain "my string". </p>
</div>
<div class="mt24">
<div class="grid fw-wrap ai-start jc-end gs8 gsy">
<time datetime="2009-05-15T17:10:01" itemprop="dateCreated"></time>

</div>

<a href="/users/57997/sarsnake"><div class="gravatar-wrapper-32"><img alt="" class="bar-sm" height="32" src="https://www.gravatar.com/avatar/85681e2ed8ce446951aa5ed8cc2d42dd?s=32&amp;d=identicon&amp;r=PG" width="32"/></div></a>
</div>
<div class="user-details" itemprop="author" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">

<div class="comment-text js-comment-text-and-form">
<div class="comment-body js-comment-edit-hide">
<span class="comment-copy">Can you give more detail on how "Doesn't contains" condition matched using above suggestion.</span>
                
– <a class="comment-user owner" href="/users/33065/nexneo" title="1,039 reputation">nexneo</a>
<span class="comment-date" dir="ltr"><span class="relativetime-clean" title="2009-05-15 17:17:59Z, License: CC BY-SA 2.5">May 15 '09 at 17:17</span></span>

<li class="comment js-comment" data-comment-id="677415" id="comment-677415">
<div class="js-comment-actions comment-actions">
<div class="comment-score js-comment-edit-hide">
<span class="cool" title="number of 'useful comment' votes received">1</span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="comment-text js-comment-text-and-form">
<div class="comment-body js-comment-edit-hide">
<span class="comment-copy">I assume you want an expression that "doesn't contain" something (it's not clear what you wish the expression not to contain). My suggestion show how you would do it if you don't want the expression to contain a digit 0 at the first position, in which which case you would limit the first position digit to 1-9.   It's not very clear what you mean by "doesn't contains". Doesn't contain what? Please clarify so we could help you. My answer was more of a general answer. Sorry if that didn't help you.</span>
                
– <a class="comment-user" href="/users/57997/sarsnake" title="22,844 reputation">sarsnake</a>

<a name="4006592"></a>
<div class="answer" data-answerid="4006592" id="answer-4006592" itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Answer">
<div class="post-layout">
<div class="votecell post-layout--left">
<div class="js-voting-container grid jc-center fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="4006592">
<button aria-label="Up vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-up-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This answer is useful"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowUpLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 26h32L18 10 2 26z"></path></svg></button>
<div class="js-vote-count grid--cell fc-black-500 fs-title grid fd-column ai-center" data-value="2" itemprop="upvoteCount">2</div>
<button aria-label="Down vote" aria-pressed="false" class="js-vote-down-btn grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary" title="This answer is not useful"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="m0 svg-icon iconArrowDownLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M2 10h32L18 26 2 10z"></path></svg></button>
<div aria-label="Accepted" class="js-accepted-answer-indicator grid--cell fc-green-500 py6 mtn8 d-none" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" role="note" tabindex="0" title="Loading when this answer was accepted…">
<div class="ta-center">
<svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" width="36"><path d="M6 14l8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8v-8z"></path></svg>
</div>
</div>
<a aria-label="Timeline" class="js-post-issue grid--cell s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer py6 mx-auto" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" data-shortcut="T" href="/posts/4006592/timeline" title="Show activity on this post."><svg aria-hidden="true" class="mln2 mr0 svg-icon iconHistory" height="18" viewbox="0 0 19 18" width="19"><path d="M3 9a8 8 0 113.73 6.77L8.2 14.3A6 6 0 105 9l3.01-.01-4 4-4-4h3L3 9zm7-4h1.01L11 9.36l3.22 2.1-.6.93L10 10V5z"></path></svg></a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
<div class="s-prose js-post-body" itemprop="text">
<p>1 + 2 + 4 conditions: starts|ends, but not in the middle</p>
<pre><code>/^@[^@]*@?$|^@?[^@]*@$/
</code></pre>
<p>is almost the same that:</p>
<pre><code>/^@?[^@]*@?$/
</code></pre>
<p>but this one matches any string without @, sample 'my name is hal9000'</p>
</div>
<div class="mt24">
<div class="grid fw-wrap ai-start jc-end gs8 gsy">
<time datetime="2010-10-23T23:38:55" itemprop="dateCreated"></time>
<div class="grid--cell mr16" style="flex: 1 1 100px;">
<div class="js-post-menu pt2" data-post-id="4006592">
